mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_SELECT, USER_NO, USER_NICKNAME, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_PW, FAQ_DATE) VALUES (FAQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{faq_no}, #{faq_title},#{faq_select},#{user_no},#{user_nickname},#{faq_content},#{faq_pw},SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM FAQ ORDER BY NO DESC) A ) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
